title: Tomatoes Trees
text: Similar to others have tomatoes accumulate overtime as you complete more sessions

title: great idea, too buggy
text: i loved the idea, features, and price ($25 for lifetime or $10/yr with a 7 day free trial), but its too buggy. while making my whitelist, i had to go in and out of the app several times because it froze. my final straw was that it blocked out every app that wasnt on my whitelist even when i wasnt in a focus session and the app wasnt even open. i had to delete it and restart my phone to fix it.

title: Ability to use 12 hr time
text: Would love the ability to switch from military time to 12 hr time for tracking.

title: A neurospicy’s holy grail
text: This app is so helpful in keeping me locked in on my studies. It’s simple and works great for my needs. One thing I wish was different is that when I open it on a new day to start my study sesh, it picks up where I left off yesterday. I’d like the option to “start new session” instead so it is a fresh pomo for the new day!

title: Wish a new feature: continue timing after 25min
text: It will be good to continue timing if I forget to click the break button. The timer will automatically stop right now. Every time I want to study a little bit longer, it will miss my long time record which makes me upset.

title: 建议
text:
已经更改了任务名字了 但是在添加到桌面时仍然显示之前的名字 强迫症真的很痛苦

The name of the task has been changed, but the previous name is still displayed when added to the desktop. Obsessive-compulsive disorder is really painful.

title: More tomato colors!!!!!
text: This app is cute and I like the time blocks. New feature request would be for different color tomatoes tied to the focus name and customizable. Also to be able to interact with the tomato’s during break time.

title: Best Pomodro Timer App EVER
text: This app is so perfect for organizing my day and time and makes it fun all in one! Thanks for such a wonderful neat app. I highly recommend this app!!!!

title: Sign up Walk Through Nightmare
text: I can't even remember the number of clicks to get into the app for the first time. In UX even 2 clicks away is bad but we're at like 20 clicks or something. Basic UX rule - let the user play with the app and stop blasting them with screens. Walkthrough instructions can come later, not right away (periodically, as the user gets to know the app). At least there's not a login screen blocking me from playing around with app for first time.

title: Pretty good
text: Wish there was a way to set the work timer by the minute (I.e. doing 52 minutes) but overall good

title: Wish a Month Time View
text:
It's necessary for me to see how much time I focused on each day of the month. But I can only look at a single day now. So I need a view overview of the 30 days of a month. 
I HOPE IT CAN COME TURE！！！

title: Adding feature: Apple widget
text: It would be great if when using the apple widget (large mode), we can see the time for all tags, not just one. I want to see the total amount of time I studied, not single individualized tags. Checking the amount of total time I studied per day helps me feel motivated. If this feature is added, I will purchase the yearly subscription.

title: A game changer!
text:
Loooove the app! It really has helped me stay on course when it comes to stuff I need to get done. 

However, I do have a suggestion. I love that FocusPomo blocks other apps from running except the ones you enable, but I think it should be taken a step further if possible. I think that we should be able to edit each tag’s whitelist. 
 
The reason why I think this would be a good implementation is because I personally use the app for a lot of different things and sometimes it would be beneficial to block certain apps during one tag and keep them open for others depending on what apps you need and when.

title: Love
text: I love this app sm

title: Feature Suggestion: Customizable Widgets
text: customizable widgets would be great!

title: Focus
text: This app helps me focus and even has rain noises to help you focus more. This app has helped me do my work and actually helps my focus levels also helped me pass my exams.

title: Absolute fav study app
text: Simple. Cute. No distractions, whats not to love?

title: THROWABLE ORANGES
text: pls make the oranges throwable for my enjoyment. PLS and THANK YOU

title: Cute - would love for tomato color variation
text:
I love the simplicity of this app and the satisfying UI. I am planning to eventually buy the lifetime version of this app. 

I appreciate that the tomatoes change size based on the focus timer length. I would also love if they changed color hue. Perhaps the small/short focus tomatoes could be green, medium tomatoes could be orange, and large tomatoes could be a ripe red. That way you can still do yellow tomatoes for “failed” timers, but there’s more variation visually for people who turn off that feature of the app. It’s a little boring to just have a bunch of orange tomatoes. :)

title: Beautiful and minimalist!
text: This app leverages all that iOS has to offer, from Widgets and Live Activities to Dynamic Island and StandBy mode. Also love the design and the tomatoes filling up the screen!

title: New Feature Wishlist
text: really love the premium version of this app! i wish there was the option for different types of background noise while you study, not just rainfall. White, pink, or brown noise would be great options!

title: 너무 귀여워요…
text: It is so cute and effective UI easy to use. But I hope there are some functions for invite friends and see their bucket of tomatoes :)

title: Great app
text: Love how the timer is customizable, and the little tomatoes are amazing motivation, collecting them makes me happy

title: Adore these tomatoes!
text: Love this app. It has literally saved my life and career because I am motivated to see these sweet pomos and can then focus once I have started my timers. Wishlist: it seems the iPhone version uses whatever timing the timer was set for last rather than saving the last timings within each tag. Each activity I do I usually want to do for the same amount of time each day, which is different for each tag, so it would be convenient to jump right to it without having to adjust every time when switching between tags. Also, for the Apple Watch version, it seems the data is not saved on the device at all, since I have lost pomos by being in airplane mode. Would love to be able to use without connectivity and be able to have the pomos show up again when online.

title: It’s so awesome!
text:
This is my favorite app for studying. I love all the little tomatoes and how they get bigger the longer you study, and how they float around on your screen. But… they’re orange?? I commonly forget it’s supposed to be a tomato and not an orange because it’s orange. 

Now, I do like how it is orange, but I at the very least want the option to make it red (so that they’re actually tomatoes and not oranges). The only reason I rated it 4 stars was so that developers could be more likely to see this than if I rated it 5 stars. If I get a response I’ll change it! 🤠👍

title: It is amazing, but missing Apple Watch Complications in the Watch Faces
text: I'm in love with this app. Sync is awesome. However, it is missing important complications for the Apple Watch app. Please add it.

title: Using for focus
text: I believe it helps keep me focused and helps me to track and see how long I've successfully focused. It is very simple. Widgets are convenient. My issue right now is that the screen doesn't rotate. When I want to charge my phone I have to look at it sideways to see the time on my screen, which seems an unnecessary inconvenience. (My portrait mode is off, I promise!)

title: This app is so fun
text: It makes  focus more fun through crisp visuals , non offensive sounds.

title: Motivating
text:
It’s so simple, but so cute that it really motivates me to keep going so I can get happy tomatoes! 

One request— I use it for my hobbies, and I’d love to be able to color code the tomatoes (or perhaps have different fruits?) so I can track my time spent on them. e.g. piano is red, vocals are green, writing is purple, etc.

title: New feature idea?
text: Add a week/month/semester wrap up!!

title: Best pomodoro app
text: I tried them all, this one nails it in terms of simplicity and features.  It has time tracking by project and pomodoro, but is super simple and easy to use. Also many widgets.  I just wish widgets worked when the phone was locked, but none of the apps support this that I tried.

title: Review
text: It’s so good and efficient fr

title: archive feature?
text: i like focuspomo, every tomato gives me a bit of dopamine. a lot of my sessions are organized by my classes so it would be nice if we could archive tags so that i keep the data but declutter the actively used tags. or at least have the option available

title: Pomodoro
text: It’s really cute!

title: New features
text: It would be nice to have the tomatoes be the color of the focus tag so that we could visual how much time we spent on each tag!

title: Love the design and works well for tracking my habit times
text: I love how the app is designed (very intuitive). It’s nice that you can swipe to see different screens, and I also love the haptic feedback of the oranges moving around. Would love to have a feature where we can change the end time for our day since I typically sleep later (around 1-2am), and I would love to have it counted for that current “day” and not the next. Thank you for the incredible app!

title: the previous version
text: I need the previous version, because I can’t pay for applications in our country, i have used the free one. When I updated to latest version, I found out I lost everything in the app. In previous one, I can see different tags for whole week in the widget box of home screen but now it is not available… poor me:(

title: Simple but effective
text: A lot of other apps have way to much going on. This is simple and you can get started instantly. The feature with the tomatoes building up is nice to see and keeps me motivated.

title: I wish to set up different timer templates
text: It would be great to have different time options to quickly start on widgets.

title: I love FocusPomo
text: Always use it ! And totally love this!

title: Doesn’t work on macOS :(
text: This is by far, one of the THE BEST apps for Pomodoro. But it doesn’t work on macOS. Devastating

title: Almost perfect pomodoro app for apple watch
text: This is probably the best pomodoro app for Apple watch users. In particular because you can see the time left at a glance.  The main issue is that there seems to be some disconnect between the widget, the pop up, and the app. Concretely, I get many phantom notifications on my watch even when a pomodoro is not supposed to be running. This seems to occur when I skip a break when the pop up comes. Or make some changes by using the Last session widget directly on the watch clock face and not the app. It would be very nice if this could be fixed!

title: This app
text: ITS ACTUALLY SO GOOD . I always found trouble with studying and focusing but when I downloaded it I felt like it got easier and made me more energetic with studying . I suggest not to take over five minutes break bc u will lose interest in studying ⚾️🥳

title: Great missing some features I would like
text: Please add a way to change the break timer! 5 mins is not always optimal.

title: great app
text: Super useful for studying & I love all the integrated features. Can y'all add in the ability to sync with my Gcal? And settings in app to modify it based on events or something?

title: Love
text: This app finally got me to start studying

title: Fitness
text: Americans getting Healthy Everyday

title: Calendar view options and Mac version
text: Since the app has a calendar view, It would be easier if there are options like one-day, three-day and whole week. For studying, I usually turn on “do not disturb.”I won’t look at my phone. It works betters for me if there is a desktop version.

title: juviugtgfdwadxc
text: i'm going back in a

title: Customized time cycle
text:
1. No ending time count (sometimes I can still focus on the work and don’t want to end)
2. No break option

title: Can you add a vibrate notification for a Pomodoro cycle?
text: In some places I’m not able to enable notification sounds and often went over the cycle time. It’d be much easier to keep on track if you support a vibrate notification in phone silent mode. :)

title: Great, but missing a few features
text: You can adjust many things, such as short break, cycle break, whitelisted apps during breaks. However, you cannot change the length of the pomodoro itself, which is a big upset for me, as i need to change the work times to allow for shorter work sessions. It is locked at 25 minutes forever.

title: Web Options
text: The app is fine, but I wish I had a web version to use on my pc so I don’t have to use my phone while working.

title: Good and simple
text:
The more I use this app, I realize it has all that I need to focus and keep track of my productivity. 

Wish / request:
Something that needs to be fixed is the synchronization of the app between the phone and the iPhone. Sometimes I stop the app from the phone but the app on the i watch keeps going and finishes the cycle despite it being stopped in the phone

title: Best that I’ve found
text:
Perfect minimal and cute app for pomodro technique. The important feature for me is the beautiful report system it shows based on time slots!
Just wishing have a mac app and a better Apple Watch sync. I couldnt sync my tags with Apple Watch after a couple of try yet.

title: Pause
text: Needs ability to pause and make completely black dark mode for OLED battery

title: Wish: add focus together feature
text: Fantastic app but would love a focus with a friend feature where you share a tomato!

title: Great App
text: Only thing missing is an extension for focus and break timers—if I don’t hit the take a break button, I wish the app would add that extra time to the existing timer.
从泥土 到星辰

title: Dream feature
text: I love love Focus Pomo! I would love it if at the end of every pomo y could input was the pomo was used for and a space where I could recap that by date. And I would love it if I could look back at all my completed pomos by week, month, year. I’m very competitive with myself and this is something that pushes me to break my own pomo record studying/working all day. My own little olympics! Btw the little pomos adding up on the screen, brilliant idea! Thank you for listening!

title: New feature request.
text:
Great app for managing my study time. Thank you devs! Maybe someday you could add the ability to add a quick comment instead of just the tag name for a completed pomodoro. 

That way I can look back on a certain day and reference what I studied that day and for how long. At least for how I use the app this would be beneficial. Thank you! Highly recommend FocusPomo.

title: Flip the phone horizontally on the iPhone
text: Why is only the screen rotation available on the iPad? Why is it not available on the iPhone search app? 🧐 I set the timer on my phone and study on my iPad

title: Feature Requests
text:
This is intuitive & cute but still perfectly simple. Thank you for making it! Here are some features I really really wish it had: 
1. Sync with Todoist. This would be a game changer. 
2. Option to use a visual timer instead of a 00:00 form. 

Bug: it keeps wanting me to buy a membership but I’m already a member and that’s quite annoying

title: 真的很好用
text: 头一回因为一个APP能自律学8小时，番茄真的太可爱了，忍不住因为想多俩番茄多学一会儿，而且它还能跟着手机的倾斜在屏幕里移动，还有撞击的轻微震动，可爱^_^

title: Great app missing one thing
text: FocusPomo is a really cute and really well designed app, but I think a per-session note function would be helpful for noting down what specifically was done during a session or any distractions that came up during one.

title: Good but not what I expected.
text:
I wish there were a way to “pause” a timer. Example, I get a quick interruption, have to use the bathroom, etc. I don’t want that time to count towards the time I allotted for the task. 

I also don’t like how subtle the end of timer sound is. I mean it’s pleasant to the ears but honestly when I’m focused I barely notice it. 

The app is super cute and nice to look at but functionality is honestly lacking. Not trying to be rude but I might have to just go back to the default iOS timer.

Update: developer response noted and appreciated.

title: I wish there was an option to customize time more specifically
text: I’d love to use this app to set one or two minute timers for integrating small workout habits etc, maybe brushing teeth, etc

title: wishlist
text: I wish when you tapped the oranges they bounced😁

title: Wish the tomatoes would stay longer
text: I love this pomodoro timer but I wish the tomatoes would stay for more than just the week. I also wish there were more customization options for visuals

title: Simple and effective
text: Does exactly what I need it to do

title: Feature wishlist
text: Have an option for the clock to keep running if you don’t grab your phone! Sometimes I’m not in a place in my studies to take a break, so it would be nice for that time to continue to add on.

title: The app is available in America!
text: You can download this app in America!

title: 请求增加功能：例如倒计时25分钟，或者倒计时50分钟
text:
番茄如果不按暂停，就会一直继续，我需要设置每个番茄的结束时间，例如倒计时25分钟，或者倒计时50分钟，也方便提醒我该休息了，不然我会一直坐在那里3小时不动😂😂——疑问🤔？日程表有什么用？就自动启动番茄吗？我第一天写了一堆日程表，没有任何反应啊

番茄怎么放弃？有这个功能可是怎么操作呢？找不到使用说明，点击番茄也没有任何反应，在哪里选择放弃番茄呢？

title: feature idea
text: add shareplay so a friend can study with you

title: Awesome
text: FocusPomo is a game changer.

title: Amazing App for Focus
text: Super amazing app - loved it. FocusPomo team also super responsive and caring, responding to issues and requests within 1-2 days. Overall would highly recommend!

title: love.
text: the timer home screen widgets don’t work on my phone, and i’d love more stats features (monthly + yearly sums) and a feature that shows the graph that is in the widget in the app. but. i LOVE this app. would recommend.

title: Best help for staying focused for finals
text: Almost perfect. I would love to see a daily study reminder and a set daily goal

title: Incredible Productivity App + A Feature I’d Hope to See Soon
text:
This app helps me focus like no other. The fact that it can block apps while the timer runs is an invaluable feature. Everything about the UI is intuitive, pleasant, and easy to use .It’s an undeniable factor at play in my success in post-graduate education and I have recommended this app to all my peers.

Something I’d love to see added:
- A setting that allows the timer to continue running once the focus session is done — also contributing to the tomato size. 
(For reference, I think Forest has this feature where the timer continues past the set time if allowed and the size of your tree increases accordingly)

At times I’d like to focus beyond the set time, and I tend to lose track of exactly how much time I continued to focus past said time. This can skew the tracking (something I greatly value in this app, and a great for of accountability for myself and my peers), as adding it manually from memory can be inaccurate.

title: Needs shortcuts
text: Can you show currently playing media with controls? Ideally like to keep the focus up as a display. iPhone StandBy mode widgets would be appreciated as well! I would also love to see the ability to run a shortcut or automation as a trigger at the start and end of a focus time.

title: Great! Just one thing…
text:
This is my first time writing a review since i was ten years old, haha. I’m currently a sophomore in college, and this app has been a huge help! Only thing is, I remember seeing someone ask for a ‘shop’ where we could use our tomatoes for different features in the app. I totally agree, and i wanted to add a few ideas. 

Maybe, once enough are collected, we can customize the look of the app. Maybe use some kind of wallpaper. Or, customize the tomatoes themselves! Completed pomodoros could earn greater rewards, while incomplete ones could yield smaller ones. Maybe add some kind of streak bonus, or a bonus when a full pomodoro cycle is completed? Maybe even add different sfx instead of just rain sounds to the app! Like, white or dark noise?

title: Tomatoes expire after a month!
text: I work hard for my tomatoes and would like to be able to keep them on my screen forever!

title: 要得

title: Adorable and helpful!!
text:
This app is so cute and helps me focus on my uni work! 🫶 I think a cute feature to add would be customizable or unlockable app themes, or maybe even a personal goal system where you can get new tomato designs for the main page! Nothing paid hopefully, just some extra optional motivation to have some more tomato diversity ☺️
I love watching the little guys bounce around when I open the app :) but any opportunity to make the app pink is a win for me 🩷 thanks for the amazing app!

title: Instagram is not blocked
text: I am trying to use the new whitelist feature, but not all apps are blocked, particularly instagram. I made sure it is not on my whitelist. I also made sure it is not part of my “always allow” apps through the “screen time” section of system settings. I would like to see this fixed please. I dont want to see it while working.

title: Best Focus App for Standby Mode
text: I use standby mode all day, and this app generally nails the functionality. It may be an option that I’m just not seeing but I desperately need this to have an auto-advance feature. Other than that, it’s phenomenal.

title: No actual free version
text:
Wanna leave a review mostly for the developer or owner of this app but if anybody finds this useful, that’s great too. Looked on App Store for a Pomodoro app to move out of a we’d app when using my phone/watch and this was the first one happened upon an App Store. As soon as opening it I was hit with like 6 different screens I had to get past only to find that it does not look like it allows you to do pretty much anything on the free version and you will never catch me buying an app blindly without using it. I’m not about to try a seven day free trial and forget about it because I’m using this is for ADHD and staying on task so the likely of me remembering to cancel a free trial are low. Moving on to the next app in the “market” and deleting this one. 

If there is a way to use the free I suggest making this much more user friendly to not have a bunch of screens to click through and then a random list of things that are behind paywalls. Make it more more obvious ( keep it simple silly).

title: Great UI! minor issue
text: wish it was easier to change the duration of each pomodoro on the calendar

title: Paid for premium but my whitelist doesnt work??
text:
What the title said, I’ve tried everything but it just blocks all of my apps no matter what. I just want to be able to open my calculator while i study 😭 I dont really want a refund, I just want my whitelist to work :(
Otherwise, great app, really keeps me motivated and locked in fr
Tomatoes r super cute, I just wish they came in diff colours tho 🤧 (ex. The longer the timer is the more red/ripe the tomato is) (ex. The colour of the label is the colour of the timer)

title: Perfect!!
text: This is what I’ve been looking for. This app is so perfect that I instantly bought the lifetime subscription. However the “Last Timer” Watch complication doesn’t show properly but other than that I have no issues.

title: Suggestion
text:
I like all of your ideas!!!

A dedicated page to display tomatoes collected weekly or monthly.
The home page could show tomatoes collected over specific periods.
The number of collected tomatoes could be exchanged for different tomato themes

title: Where do the tomatoes go?
text: I would like to collect my Pomo tomatoes beyond one week of use. Is this already a feature? If yes, how can I activate it? I am so sad when they all disappear.  Thank you for your attention to this feature!

title: Excel export
text: I wanna export it to excel to keep a systematic track of my hourly management!! But love this app

title: I love it
text: This is the most aesthetic and fun pomodoro app without ads

title: 背景音乐选择
text: 没有设置，个性化不强。背景音乐只有一种（rainly），可以有其他专注的白噪音或一两首纯音乐比较好

title: I want an option to turn off dark mode. Also, timer keeps starting by itself
text: Timer starts randomly by itself and I want an option to use light mode widgets in dark mode. If I’m paying, I should have this ability for customization and the app should not be starting on its own. It once sent my phone into whitelist mode, blocking all my apps when I never set it up in the first place. Thank you

title: Great but a visual bug is frustrating
text: Every time upon opening the app following completion of the timer, the little congratulations badge card is off centered and glitching out. Makes the app experience seem laggy and unpolished.

title: Solid, wish it had more features
text: Would love a do to list page

title: Additional development needed
text: I was ready to sing this apps praises, and purchase the additional enhanced version but there’s one big issue. Focus timers are for the same time regardless of any activity. I would like to set the focus timer for 15 minutes for studying and 20 minutes for reading since our teacher is asking for 20 minutes of reading time. Whatever time you set at the beginning of the app settings, you cannot change in the future so I can only use this app for studying which very unfortunate because otherwise, this is great.

title: Love!!!
text:
I am currently in grad school and this app has been a helpful tool to help me stay on task with my school work! I have also used it for other daily tasks and interests to decrease my doom scrolling. Some features I would like to see in the future! 
1. Setting goals! Across different focus modes, and the option for daily weekly, monthly, and or yearly goals. 
2. Different sound options. As of now the only sound option in the app are rain sounds, I would love to see different options in the future.

title: Love this app, wish there were more fruit options though!
text:
The tomatoes on the screen are superrr satisfying and I really like how the focus sessions are customizable!! The tomatoes are super rewarding and I love then.
The only feedback I have is just a suggestion, I think it would be so cute if there were different fruit options or color options so it’s more personal!

title: me
text: that looks amazing 🤩

title: meh
text: There’s not much customizability, even with the pro version. There’s no way to change background colors or text colors which is a huge negative for me.

title: Best App i ever invested in
text: amazing app definitely recommend getting it

title: 想要Mac版本的
text: 整体用的挺好。

title: Love it! (Suggestion)
text:
Pomodoro has always been an affective way for my productivity issues surrounding ADHD. This app makes focus time fun and rewarding! Seeing the tomato’s add up, the option to block distractions from outside apps, it’s great! Even the fun way the tomatoes move on the apps screen. 

Suggestion. I know a tomato is red but, I wish my tomato’s were color coded to the type of focus I earned them for. My school work focus color is red and my cleaning/chores focus is purple, it would give a sense of how my time was split and give a visual on how many focus sessions I spent on each type of focused activity.

title: Color Code Tomatoes
text: Maybe by label

title: Flowmodoro?
text: I wish that the stopwatch feature had adjusted break times based on the amount of time studied!

title: Great!
text: Really great, simple, organized, and free!

title: No alarm
text: This interface is cute and all but there’s no alarm sound to let you know the focus is over! At least with the free version. Makes the app pointless!

title: why a subscription?
text: I am drowning in subscriptions. why do I need another one for a pomodoro timer? make one time purchase an option.

title: Study
text: Love the mini breaks after studying.

title: Nice simple tracker (free version)
text: Aside from the constant notices, urging me to upgrade, I really just need a simple Pomodoro timer. It does work well, and I like the simple gamification that helps motivate me to use it more consistently.

title: Whitelist feature doesn’t work
text: This app is perfect but the whitelist feature is currently broken. When you turn the whitelist feature on and have no apps selected on your whitelist, it should restrict you from using every single app on your phone, but for some reason it doesn’t restrict some of the default Apple apps such as messages, phone and safari. This absolutely ruins the whitelist feature, which is a HUGE part of why I use this app!!

title: The whitelist feature decides when it wants to work
text: When I try to edit the whitelist, it randomly does or doesn’t go through, but most of the time, it doesn’t (for reference, I’ve bought a lifetime subscription). Please fix ASAP, since this app is crucial to my productivity!

title: BEST POMODORO TIMER
text: BEST APP EVER!!! it helps me focus so much and motivates me to actually get my work done so I can earn the cute tomatoes :) I love the rain sounds, the feature where the tomatoes move with the tilt of your device, and just the overall adorable design and concept. i get so happy seeing the a visual accumulation of my effort; and in the cutest way ever too! thank you for making this amazing app!!!!

title: Cute productivity assistant
text: The app is cute and keeps me wanting to use it.

title: Add landscape mode
text: I love this app very much! One suggestion I would like to see implemented is that when the timer starts, it can go into landscape mode when the phone is turned on its side. Thanks you so much!

title: Suggestion
text:
Feature wishlist:

1) be able to get tomatoes in different colors and facial expressions depending on how long you focus

2) Focus modes: be able to personalize based on the tag

title: Great start, but missing some key features
text: No support for 12 hour AM/PM time. Would love to see ability to choose different app appearance settings (always dark mode/auto, color choices, etc).

title: Useful cute app, but iPhone widgets aren’t working
text: I like the app and the general look of it is cute. I like the tag system to have focus on different areas and to see the charts. I wish the charts worked on my widget, currently the widget doesn’t show any data. Also I wish I could pause my timer without abandoning.

title: So far so good
text:
Feature wishlist:
1, stopwatch mode
2, potentially more fruit species to choose from? Like apples, pears, etc. If some people find this distracting, tomatoes are still the default choice and you can trade earned tomatoes to unlock a new fruit if you want?

title: Automatically starts break after a session
text: I don’t want to touch my phone for both of my focus and break sessions, so automatically starting the small break would be nice. And the whole session (focus + break) can end after the long break.

title: Awesome app
text: Whitelist needs work. Frequently the app crashes when trying to find apps to add to the Whitelist. Not the entire app, but that section blacks out, and they only way to move forward it to close that section again. Additionally when you search for an app, you can select the app, but there's no way to save that app to the Whitelist. The only options are cancel and go back which removes the app again. Also you can't open the Other category in the Whitelist. It just blacks out, and you have to go back.  I'm stuck and have to end the focus session early if I want to turn my ac on lol. Otherwise I adore the app!

title: Work exceptionally well with Apple Watch
text: Work well but sometime it does not sync all focus instances to my icloud calendar. Please fix.

title: I like
text: Helps w focus

title: 7 different pop up screens when you open the app
text: This is a really cool design for an app. I love how the phone vibrates as you tilt your phone and the orange moves, it’s a good subconscious incentive to open the app. However, when you open it you have to click through literally 7+ screens just to get to the timer. 5 of them are unnecessary. Just annoying, but I’ll keep using the app

title: App Theme
text: I like the app but I wish I had an option to change the background from light/dark instead of the app following my phone’s settings. For example, I like my phone in dark mode, but I like how this app looks in light mode. I want to be able to pick whether the app is in light/dark mode.

title: It’s great!
text: Love the app

title: Unbelievably frustrating
text: I want to like this app because the aesthetics and design are great, super cute, but I can’t add sessions to be calendar successfully to save the life of me. I click add new session, the duration auto sets to 10 hours and any attempt to set the start time, end time, or duration NEVER gets to when I want it to be. I can’t believe I wasted $25 on this…

title: Study
text: Focus

title: I love it
text:
I really like this app I would love if the colors of the tomats would change but be randomized so it’s another tiny dopamine hint when it’s a color you like

Thx!

title: Ability to change duration of focus
text: It looks like you could only have a focused time. Period of 20 minutes. I’d love to be able to change that to a little longer.

title: Color coded tomatoes?
text:
Love the home page tomatoes animation. 
It would be nice to see different colored tomatoes for each tag so that on the home page we can know what tag we did most pomodoros for. 
However, this should be a like option we can pick between seeing current same colored tomatoes or color coded tomatoes. As some people might not like the color coded view of tomatoes.
Also would be nice if you could  make it so that we can pick whatever color we want for the tags from a color picker as some people like pastel colors and some like bright.

title: Google calendar
text: Can it sync to my google calendar?
Great app. It’d be cool if different tags made different colored tomatoes or maybe just have some way to only show the tomatoes for the currently selected tag

title: Does require u to pay for any version
text: App seems cool I’m just not in a place to justify buying what’s essentially a timer. I just wish they’d tell me that I had to pay something to get any version of the app before I read everything. Not a huge thing, just a bit irritating.

title: love it!!!
text: i love this app and it’s the perfect  pomodoro timer, i would love if it was easier to synch between my devices as my ipad hasn’t connected and realize i bought the membership. thank you though! please also make the tomatoes interactive! touching them maybe makes them smile :)

title: SO HELPFUL!!
text: I find it so difficult to focus. As soon as I downloaded this app, everything seemed to click.

title: They have complications now!
text: I was originally going to give this only four stars because I could not find the complication, but I found it, and it is great. So, five stars.

title: Update to change oranges
text: I love everything about this app except that we can’t change the little oranges!  Is there any way to put that in a mew update?
